title: 13-Year-Old Shot, Killed
content:
Lexington, SC (WLTX) - The shooting of a 13-year-old boy at a home in Lexington is under investigation.
Ethan H. Payne, 13, was shot around 3 p.m. Wednesday at a home on Armwood Court. He was taken to the hospital where he was pronounced dead.
An autopsy confirmed he died from a single gunshot wound.
Police are still looking into the circumstances leading up to the shooting.
